QuestData.Title: Upgrading The Fleet
QuestData.Description: You have been doing a great job out there commander. However, we are going to need more experience and resources to upgrade this shipyard. Once we reach our goals, we can upgrade the capacity of the shipyard to hold more ships!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 1000 garrison resources, 1000 gold and complete 15 naval missions.
QuestData.CompletionText: Finding success on these new naval missions?
